artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Tsutaya Kichizō
catalogue_raissonne: Ukiyo-e shūka 14 (1981), Hiroshige list, p. 252, ōban #24.01
description: landscape view with figures at bottom working in open-porched buildings; water through center, with figures rowing boats filled with cargo; long bridge at center with figures; a second bridge at right, URQ; white buildings at left center; mountain peak in background, ULQ; from an accordion-folded album with black soft cover
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Famous Sights of the Fifty-Three Stations (Gojūsan tsugi meisho zue 五十三次名所圖會), also known as the Vertical Tōkaidō (Tate Tōkaidō)
title: 1, Nihonbashi
